Reviews.Title: A whole lot to like, few quirks, otherwise it would have been 5*
Reviews.Author: James L. Strong "max4urmoney"
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is spectacular and the sound is adequate. I really enjoyed this television, but here are some quirks, have to change the TV to DVD to even have the disk inserted, meaning, it is more complicated than it needs to be. I would rather, if I insert a DVD, that it switches automatically, as that is the reason, after all, I am inserting a DVD. I love "mute", as I do not tolerate commercials well, mute is a very small button on the remote. The remote is very responsive, but is laid out strangely, in comparison to others. Mine was listed as 1080i and it looked it, Mine has 3 HDMI and a "-C" at the end of the model number. Really quite impressed with the resolution and not disappointed with the sound either. All in all, great television and the DVD player is a nice bonus to have it in the package, despite being more manual than it needs to be. I would give the picture quality a solid 5*, sound 4*, remote, 3*= 4* total. Price and overall satisfaction 5*.

Reviews.Title: Great TV with DVD Player
Reviews.Author: Nicole from Long Island
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV as I wanted to have a good size tv with the option of playing DVDs.  We have a huge collection of DVDs, especially for my kids, so it is convenient to have a DVD player right built into the TV.  I am very pleased with our purchase.  The TV was easy to set up and looks really nice on the TV stand I got for it.  Picture quality is better than I expected.  Sound quality is definitely adequate - it isn't bose quality speakers, but I have no trouble hearing the TV loudly from across the room.  I would recommend to someone looking for an affordable TV with great features and a nice design.

Reviews.Title: Best Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Barbara Kone
Reviews.Content: This TV has meet and exceeded my expectations. I have it  HDM1 and it looks like 3D. I would recommend this product to my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Proscan TV
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: This TV is a great buy have one same brand  works fine great sound and picture quality  so I said get a combo it works great.

Reviews.Title: We purchased this TV with great expevtations but...
Reviews.Author: HZ
Reviews.Content: Were are on day 40 of owning the Proscan 32-inch HD TV with built in DVD player and are now boxing it up for repairs.  The DVD player is non-functional and additional monies have been spent trying to follow "suggestions" from customer service. The service received via phone was terrible as it appears the customer service department is off shore and they are only equipped with a list of pat answers that are of no help whatsoever.  We were disconnected each and every time a transfer to the next person who would repeat the same nothing answers so needed to redial and go through the same useless steps 7 times.We purchased because the description was that is was in great condition etc.  This TV was to be used in our new business and the centerpiece to the open house/grand opening now in just days so we are extremely disappointed with the TV and the lack of customer service thus far.I will write more once we hear what can or can not be done after the "repair" is done to which we are responsible for all shipping charges etc.

Reviews.Title: DVD PLAYER DOES NOT WORK
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: DVD player did not work straight out of the box, still have not been able to get the DVD player to work.Be very wary ordering this product.

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: Angela Mcjunkins
Reviews.Content: The picture is beautiful. The DVD is easy to work.  My granddaughter loves it.  Great, Great, Great!  I rate this product as high as I can,

Reviews.Title: Repeat logo won't go away
Reviews.Author: thdmd
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV/DVD combo specifically to run DVDs on loop all day.  Problem is whenever repeat is selected there is a repeat logo on the screen that never goes away!

Reviews.Title: DVD player
Reviews.Author: ERica
Reviews.Content: TV shows a great picture. Sad to say the DVD player does not work! Sad we can't be without a TV and send it back for another one. Electronics should be checked before sent out to customers.

Reviews.Title: Great Television
Reviews.Author: S. Farr
Reviews.Content: This television arrived on time, lightweight, easy to set up and is great for a bedroom because it has the built in DVD player.

Reviews.Title: Proscan is really Curtis. Customer Service is in India.
Reviews.Author: Gerald Waite "gerrywaite1"
Reviews.Content: Only connection to a Home Theater system is the Headphone Jack.This means that your stereo must be on at all times to hear your TV.I instruction manual clearly shows a Digital Coax out for audio,but it is Not on the TV.Customer service is located in India and they don't seam to understand what I am talking about,so I finally gave up on any attempt of communication.I feel Tricked,and Deceived because the instruction manual that came with my TV is Not accurate at all.If I had know that Proscan was actually Curtis I would have not bought this TV.

Reviews.Title: The DVD Player Does not work
Reviews.Author: Ken Randle
Reviews.Content: Fresh out the box never been use. After setting it up, I go to watch a DVD movie and the DVD Player would not except the DVD at all.

Reviews.Title: perfect!!!!
Reviews.Author: I. m
Reviews.Content: Nice, clean and sleek, works perfectly, can play as a computer, DVD, and TV. High quality. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Kristin Clendenen
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV two months ago for our bedroom and it has worked amazingly well. The sound is good, picture is clear, and it's playing the DVDs accordingly. My only complaint is that it has to be in DVD mode to insert or eject DVDs. I would like to purchase another one, but it looks like it'll be a long wait.Edit- I've now owned this TV for 9 months and I have changed my mind. It does not play DVDs anymore. Neither does the 19 in. one we bought for our daughters' room. Do not buy this brand. Spend a few more hundred dollars and get a reliable one.

Reviews.Title: Works well in the camper
Reviews.Author: S & L
Reviews.Content: We put this in our camper because of the built in DVD feature.  It works well, the picture was a pleasant surprise, I didn't expect it to be quite as crisp for it being a cheaply priced t.v.

Reviews.Title: Not quality I expected from an RCA (Proscan) product
Reviews.Author: Patricia Mommone
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV because it had the DVD combo.  We hooked it up on December 18, 2013.  It worked fine until March 1, 2013 (approximately 72 days).  Then the screen went to black.  We had sound but no picture.  I wanted to return it but it seems that the last day I could return it was January 31, 2014.  Then I called the phone number on the warranty paperwork.  They have no tech support...no one who can trouble-shoot a problem.  Basically, if you have a problem, you have to return the TV at your own expense.  This TV was in a den and no one messed with it so it wasn't abused in any way.  It really sucks that an item like this doesn't even work for 3 months and then you have to pay to ship to the manufacturer for repair.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: JTaylor
Reviews.Content: I've got no real complaints on this at all. Picture and sound quality is great and we have had no issues with is since purchasing a month ago.

Reviews.Title: Flat t.v.
Reviews.Author: Sue C. Ogden
Reviews.Content: It is what it is supposed to be - clear picture, easy to hook up, easy to operate.The only negative is the audio it seems to me is a bit "tinny" even after adjusting.I may try attaching my own speakers to enhance the audio.

Reviews.Title: info on the t v purchase
Reviews.Author: akira
Reviews.Content: Love my TV ... n have no issues so far so im happy ...enjoying it now n thankful but it did take a while to get here

Reviews.Title: Great price for a TV and DVD !!!
Reviews.Author: Hall family
Reviews.Content: Great color , love how thin it is !  A Great Tv for the price. We don't have any problems with the dvd player at all ! Hope to buy another one !

Reviews.Title: Operationally challenged
Reviews.Author: Floyd
Reviews.Content: The ability to switch from different inputs and selecting a source for the TV is a little different than most any other brand on the market. Makes using the remote a little confusing at first, read the manual to avoid confusion there. DVD player will not accept a DVD into the unit until it is switched into DVD mode. Picture quality and sound are good for a TV for this price. If it was a a little more user friendly I would have rated it higher.

Reviews.Title: Good picture - Awful Sound
Reviews.Author: Armand Balsano
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is good but the sound quality is very poor even for a flat panel TV. In addition the remote control is very poorly laid out and difficult to use. This TV was cheap in price and you get what you pay for

Reviews.Title: great-served as a gift
Reviews.Author: Paul Cliver "Paul M Cliver"
Reviews.Content: As a gift it served well. As a product it is working well in Sons home/he and girlfriend love it. A winner.

Reviews.Title: Works but not to easy to use
Reviews.Author: Jing Chen
Reviews.Content: This TV/DVD combo is exactly what I needed in front of the treadmill.  I'm happy to see it functions well as a TV or DVD player and I can stream netflix with a Ruku.  The start-up was a trying experience mainly due to the fact that the buttons on the remote were not intuitive at all. The Enter button was really small and hidden among other small buttons. I first thought the DVD was broken as I could not eject the disk out. It turned out you have to be in that mode first to eject the disk. It is easy to use after initial set up if you use same mode. However, switching from one mode to another could be frustrating for a new user.

Reviews.Title: Love the purchase
Reviews.Author: Lynn Cobb "Lynn Cobb"
Reviews.Content: Great TV...great price. Love it. Great picture.  Easy to use and plays all my dvds. Definitely worth the money.  I am considering purchasing another one.

Reviews.Title: good dollar value
Reviews.Author: lP Lacy
Reviews.Content: easy setup.  no problems.  sharp picture.  sound is ok.  worth the price which was very reasonable.  will buy again. well packaged.

Reviews.Title: Nice idea, but has flaws!
Reviews.Author: dadkaz
Reviews.Content: The picture quality of this set is not bad, but the sound quality is terrible.  Purchased this television for my elderly parents---both 89 years old.  The sound is not at all what I expected.  Adjusted settings and its turned up all the way.  Not very loud at all.  Might have to purchase a sound bar for them----AT AN ADDED COST--MORE MONEY.  My advice is keep  looking and find something else.  Also the DVD player is hard to operate.  Not at all what I hoped it to be.  Two stars for the nice bright picture.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS JUNK!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Don Simpson
Reviews.Content: Bought it in December and dead in March and not " eligible" to return. I buy tons of stuff from Amazon suppliersSTAY AWAY FROM THIS PIECE OF JUNK....

Reviews.Title: Good Monitor...TV/DVD - Meh
Reviews.Author: SS
Reviews.Content: WELL, I'm glad I bought this to be a monitor and not really a TV/DVD player.  I just figured it would be cool to have a dual purpose piece of equipment.  The speakers are awful...everything sounds flat and tinny.  The remote must have been designed by a moron. The buttons are not in a logical pattern which might be manageable if the remote was back-lit, but it's not.  The buttons are tiny and the button that is the "enter" button on every other remote I have EVER owned is the "menu" button on this remote...the "enter" button is tiny and lower down on the remote next to other random buttons instead of in the center of the arrow/directional button circular cluster. I guess it could be an odd remote because it has to do more things...all I know is it doesn't  make it easy on the user. DVD's  are not easy to load...I have to turn the equipment off and on until it will accept a DVD...rarely will it take a DVD without some sort of fiddling around.  As a monitor it functions very nicely.  I can work on my giant spreadsheets at home and not have to try and read them and make adjustments to them on my laptop's tiny screen.  This will surely keep me from going blind at an early age!  The monitor function of this unit is a winner.  I bought the add-on wall mount arm Amazon paired with this item and it is fabulous.  Easy to install and adjust.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after one month of use
Reviews.Author: Mike j sICOLI
Reviews.Content: I have been using this unit to view a video I have to show before renting a waverunner. Went to turn it on and it won't power up. I have been using it for about 3 weeks. Junk, beware before buying...

Reviews.Title: Damn!
Reviews.Author: barr
Reviews.Content: Need to call customer service...tv menu won't let me into channel, and the dvd picture won't zoom down enough to contain the picture completely

Reviews.Title: Only three design issues to mention
Reviews.Author: DB "DB"
Reviews.Content: The TV plays.  The DVD plays.  The picture quality is what you'd expect from a TV at this price and size - no dead pixels.Design shortfalls:1.  Keys on the remote are laid out in non-standard configuration.  Some of the critical keys like select and play are hard to find.  They're all there just not where you'd expect them.2.  No USB port.  Found it odd that a new TV didn't have one and I like to use that feature to play photos and music at the same time.  Oh well can make a home movie DVD.3.  DVD does not remember your place in a movie.  So it starts fresh each time you turn it on.  Just a minor inconvenienceStill a good TV for the price though and I did purchase a second unit.  Would recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: No DirectTV remote code
Reviews.Author: K. Karlen
Reviews.Content: Just purchased this for my mother, who needs things to be simple at her age. Replacing a smaller Toshiba DVD combo set.  She is not happy with how she has to switch the source to DVD to insert and watch one, and even less happy that the DirectTV remote cannot be programmed for the set.  I'm currently on a hunt for a universal remote that might work both the satellite box and the TV.Other than that the picture and sound quality is fine.  The remote is small with small buttons and print, even I had trouble deciphering it.

Reviews.Title: IT STOPPED WORKING !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: R. Grier
Reviews.Content: What more could I ask for?  I could ask that it work for longer than 43 days.  It is "non responsive". No power outage or disconnect.  Just nothing. I pray this company has a good customer service area.  I will repost my results later.  Right now, I wish I could give it a zero.

Reviews.Title: 32 in TV with dvd
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: i have not removed it from the box yet the price was great I got it for the RV cant B all that bad

Reviews.Title: Wish the price go down
Reviews.Author: Pretty
Reviews.Content: I really like this TV, but I wish the price would goDown . I would like to purchase it

ProductInfo.Features:
Proscan 32-Inch TV with Built-In DVD Player
Connections:  3 x HDMI Ports, VGA, YPbPr, AV Audio/Video, PC Audio Headphone, RF
Aspect Ratio - 16:9; refresh rate - 60 Hz
Use the TV as a Computer Monitor
Wall Mount Ready (200x200 mm); Digital Comb Filter; Full Function Remote Control included
ProductInfo.Name: Proscan 32-Inch HDTV with Built-In DVD Player
